column1: # indices in this table correspond to 0-based indexing of each model's param array
# subs_idx = index for the parameter arrays associated with substitution mixtures
# equl_idx = index for the parameter arrays associated with equlibrium mixtures
# indel_idx = index for the parameter arrays associated with indel model mixtures
# example: indel_idx=0 means mixture uses indel_mix_probs[0], etc.
